overview: Kings America Made tells the story of a young black boy's journey to find peace in America, while grappling with his own mental trauma, evolving sexuality and visions of death. His story is told through real life testimonies of four queer black men: Kameron Mack, Daniel P. Calderon, Richard Brookshire & Deon Mims. This film is for young black queer boys who need to know that life gets better.
title: Kings America Made
